paper_abstract: Results: We implement our approach using existing Gibbs samplers redesigned for parallel hardware. We applied to a real-world dataset, performing parametric multipoint linkage analysis on a highly consanguineous pedigree with EAST syndrome, containing 28 members, where a subset of individuals were genotyped with single nucleotide polymorphisms (SNPs). In our experiments with a four core CPU and GPU, achieves a 8.5x speed-up over the single-threaded version and a 109x speed-up over the popular linkage analysis program.
paper_title: SwiftLink: parallel MCMC linkage analysis using multicore CPU and GPU
